<< issingle types module isint32 >>

isuint8

Return true if variable var is an unsigned 8-bit integer type array.

Syntax

res = isuint8(var)

Input argument

var

a variable

Output argument

res

a logical: true or false

Description

isuint8 returns a logical 1if the argument is an unsigned 8-bit integer array and a logical 0 otherwise.

Examples

A = 3;
res = isuint8(A)


B = uint8(3);
res = isuint8(B)

See also

isa, uint8, isinteger.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
